title.rendered: Dr. Aman Bathla joins hands with Smile Foundation to support the survivors of Cyclone Fani

content.rendered:
“Music has the power to heal and to transform lives.”

Dr. Aman Bathla, a renowned musician accredited with the title of the world’s fastest pianist, dedicated some solemn music to the survivors of Cyclone Fani. He expressed his gratitude in being a part of a noble cause rendered towards the distressed people affected by this disaster. He also urged the masses to extend their support to the hardworking members and volunteers of the on-ground Team of Smile, in rebuilding the lives of the people of Odisha.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 750,000 children and their families every year, through more than 350 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 1000 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
